name: Jaguar XJ220
description:
Race your Jaguar XJ220 against other super cars including Ferraris, Porsches and Lamborghinis over thirty six circuits through twelve different countries. Speed through variable weather conditions whilst tackling waterfalls, tunnels, cliffs, bridges and mountain passes.

    Fog, snow, wind, rain and sandstorms.
    One or two-player split-screen option.
    Joystick or mouse control.
    Map editor - Create your own circuits.
    Financial Management strategy.
